content.headline: A special occasion deserves a special adventure.
content.copy:
Check out these great drives I've found for us to take around New South Wales.
To make it easy, I've even plotted the routes in Google maps.
Just click the links and we're ready to roll.
So what do you say? Let's get going!

children.headline: The Great Mountain Drive
children.copy: An exciting journey that takes in a vast and spectacular World Heritage area and surrounds. This drive stretches from the Upper Hunter to the Hawkesbury, and passes through Mudgee, Goulburn, and the Southern Highlands.

children.headline: Fossickers Way
children.copy: This drive will take us down a series of scenic country roads located in the Northern Tablelands region of New South Wales, passing through quaint country towns, picture-perfect landscapes and past the Golden Guitar in Tamworth.

children.headline: Darling River Run
children.copy: This adventurous and scenic outback drive follows the course of the Darling River from Walgett to Wentworth and is the main route to Opal Country.

content.headline: A special occasion deserves a special adventure.
content.copy:
Check out these great drives I've found for us to take around Victoria.
To make it easy, I've even plotted the routes in Google maps.
Just click the links and we're ready to roll.
So what do you say? Let's get going!

children.headline: Lake Mountain
children.copy: Named by Top Gear Australia as the country's best driving road, this drive will see us climb through Marysville and then down through the Yarra Ranges National Park. Can't wait!

children.headline: Black Spur Drive
children.copy: Let's take in the breathtaking landscape of the Yarra Ranges as we pass between Healesville and Narbethong on the Maroondah Highway. With beautiful fauna, this is one of the best scenic drives in Victoria.

children.headline: Bright to Omeo
children.copy: Let's traverse The Great Alpine Road starting in Bright and finishing in Omeo. We'll make our way through Alpine National Park as we enjoy one of Australia's most iconic drives.

content.headline: A special occasion deserves a special adventure.
content.copy:
Check out these great drives I've found for us to take around Queensland.
To make it easy, I've even plotted the routes in Google maps.
Just click the links and we're ready to roll.
So what do you say? Let's get going!

children.headline: Blackall Range Tourist Drive
children.copy: This beautiful hinterland drive is just inland from the Sunshine Coast. Starting in Mooloolaba, we'll take the Sunshine Motorway to the Bruce Highway heading south, and loop back to the Sunshine Coast.

children.headline: The Scenic Rim Way
children.copy: The Scenic Rim of south Queensland is a spectacular regional area full of tradition, colonial history, wine, scenic views, National Parks, and more. This drive crosses the Scenic Rim from east to west connecting Aratula to the Gold Coast. Shall we?

content.headline: A special occasion deserves a special adventure.
content.copy:
Check out these great drives I've found for us to take around South Australia.
To make it easy, I've even plotted the routes in Google maps.
Just click the links and we're ready to roll.
So what do you say? Let's get going!

children.headline: Yorke Peninsula
children.copy: Travel northwest from Port Wakefield and meander across the top of the Yorke Peninsula. Driving further along to the coastal town of Port Broughton, you can stroll along the esplanade and relax under the shade of the Norfolk Island pine trees. I'll catch my breath too.

children.headline: Fleurieu Peninsula
children.copy: Just 45 minutes outside of Adelaide there's an abundance of food, wine and adventure to be enjoyed, and over 200km of coastline and beaches to explore.

content.headline: A special occasion deserves a special adventure.
content.copy:
Check out these great drives I've found for us to take around Western Australia.
To make it easy, I've even plotted the routes in Google maps.
Just click the links and we're ready to roll.
So what do you say? Let's get going!

children.headline: Great Ocean Drive
children.copy: This 38-kilometre circular loop from Esperance takes in some of the most beautiful coastal scenery Australia has to offer, including Twilight Beach, the Rotary Lookout, and Observatory Point.

children.headline: Zig Zag Scenic Drive
children.copy: This trip explores the Darling Range and its line of eucalypt-covered hills, extending 80km north and roughly 220km south of Perth, providing panoramic views across the coast.

content.headline: A special occasion deserves a special adventure.
content.copy:
Check out these great drives I've found for us to take around Northern Territory.
To make it easy, I've even plotted the routes in Google maps.
Just click the links and we're ready to roll.
So what do you say? Let's get going!

children.headline: Berry Springs
children.copy: Just 47 km south of Darwin, there's plenty to see and do here on a perfect day trip away. Be sure to pack picnic to enjoy amongst the nature and serenity of the park.

children.headline: Explorer's Highway
children.copy: Are we feeling adventurous? Let's follow the route of pioneer John McDouall Stuart by travelling from Adelaide and work our way up to Darwin.

content.headline: A special occasion deserves a special adventure.
content.copy:
Check out these great drives I've found for us to take around Tasmania.
To make it easy, I've even plotted the routes in Google maps.
Just click the links and we're ready to roll.
So what do you say? Let's get going!

children.headline: Tasman Peninsula to Fortescue Bay
children.copy: For a truly enjoyable day-trip from Hobart, we could start at the Tasman Peninsula approximately 75km south east of the city and make our way through Tarana and into Fortescue Bay.

children.headline: Huon Valley
children.copy: Huon Valley is a picturesque area dotted with bustling towns and peaceful villages, with easy to access the rainforest from Geeveston. We can start in Hobart, and make our way through the valley to finishing at the Huon River. This is renowned as one of the best drives in the state. Let's find out for ourselves.

content.headline: Be sure to check my tyre pressure.
content.copy:
Getting my tyres to optimal pressure before we get going means we're both going to have a better
drive, and my tyres are going to last longer. Check out this video for lots of helpful tips.
